aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.subTitle: My Skillsets
content: Hi, I'm Eric Liu, a passionate self-taught frontEnd web developer from Taiwan.
I tend to make use of modern web technologies to build websites that looks great,
feels fantastic, and functions correctly. I am especially focusing on Reactjs.

project.title: Message Board
project.summary: Simple message board with separate front and back ends. The front and back ends are deployed on GitHub and Heroku.

project.title: This personal website
project.summary: This page is a personal website made with React.js.

project.title: Landing Page
project.summary: In cooperation with the designer, I am responsible for the part of the program
